comments: Beyond the second entry, sequence corresponds to primes ending in 1 or 7. - _Lekraj Beedassy_, Jan 14 2007
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
prog: (MAGMA) [p: p in PrimesUpTo(400) | p mod 5 in [0..2]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Aug 10 2012
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
